sentences.sContent: "If Joanne cracks her gum one more time, I swear I'm going to send my stapler sailing into her cubicle," you think to yourself.
sentences.sContent_eng: "If Joanne cracks her gum one more time, I swear I'm going to send my stapler sailing into her cubicle," you think to yourself.
sentences.sCn: 你在心里对自己说“如果下次乔安娜再嚼口香糖的话，我发誓一定冲过去将订书机甩到她位置上。

sentences.sContent: Put your pens, stapler, paper clips, digital camera, and any other assorted gear in a drawer, organized neatly. While you’re at it, clear out your drawers and only put in the essential stuff.
sentences.sContent_eng: Put your pens, stapler, paper clips, digital camera, and any other assorted gear in a drawer, organized neatly. While you’re at it, clear out your drawers and only put in the essential stuff.
sentences.sCn: 你不必将所有的办公设备放在面前，你只需要在用它们的时候把他们找出来就行；将你的笔、订书机、纸夹、数码相机和其他的办公设备放入抽屉里码好。

sentences.sContent: I never thought I could go a year without a stapler or paperclips — but I'm happy to report that I have. (I guess attaching papers isn't as important as I'd thought!
sentences.sContent_eng: I never thought I could go a year without a stapler or paperclips — but I'm happy to report that I have. (I guess attaching papers isn't as important as I'd thought!
sentences.sCn: 我从来没有想过我能离开订书机或者曲别针整整一年，但是我很高兴的告诉大家，我做到了，因为我发现把文件装订到一起并不像我想象的那么重要。

synos.tran: [轻]订书机；主要商品批发商；把羊毛分级的人

words.tran: 主要的，大宗生产的；常用的；纺织纤维的

trans.tranOther: a tool used for putting staples into paper
